doc.field: C L f0965reute u f BC-slaughter-guesstimate 03-19 0063

Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 295,000 to 305,000 head versus 307,000 week ago and 311,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 124,000 to 128,000 head versus 127,000 week ago and 126,000 a year ago. Reuter
